title: Evelynn no longer has Hunter's Machete in her recommended starting items on the PBE server.
body:
Instead, she now has Crystalline Flask as her recommended item.

Clearly, Riot wants to bring Evelynn mid back. I can't wait until they finally flesh out her new identity, since Evelynn jungle sucks right now. Rito pls. Make her E do magic damage again or something. I want assassin Eve - not the awkwardly built BDSM-aesthetic succubus who for some reason builds a Randuin's Omen or Hexdrinker just to survive long enough to do damage!
